description: MIE (Media Information Exchange) tag definitions with comprehensive subdirectory coverage

tables.description: MIE main tag table - entry point with SubfileType, MIEVersion, and Meta subdirectory
MIE meta information group - central hub with Audio, Camera, Document, Geo, Image, MakerNotes, Preview, Thumbnail, Video subdirectories
MIE document information - main document/image/file description
MIE geographic location information with GPS and UTM subdirectories
MIE GPS information - altitude, latitude, longitude, coordinate system
MIE image information - dimensions, color space, compression
MIE audio information - codec, sample rate, channels
MIE video information - codec, frame rate, dimensions
MIE camera information with Flash, Lens, Orientation subdirectories - exposure, ISO, settings
MIE orientation information - rotation, perspective correction
MIE lens information with Extender subdirectory - focal length, aperture, zoom
MIE lens extender information - magnification, make, model
MIE flash information - power, mode, sync speed
MIE maker notes with Canon subdirectory and various manufacturer Unknown tables
MIE Canon-specific information with CanonVRD data
MIE unknown/generic maker notes for unsupported manufacturers
